sanskrit_verse:
पलं सुवर्णाश्चत्वारः पलानि धरणं दश ।
द्वे कृष्णले समधृते विज्ञेयो रौप्यमाषकः ॥ ८.१३५॥
transliteration: palaṃ suvarṇāścatvāraḥ palāni dharaṇaṃ daśa | dve kṛṣṇale samadhṛte vijñeyo raupyamāṣakaḥ || 8.135||
sph_interpretive_translation: Four suvarnas constitute one pala; ten palas constitute one dharna; two kṛṣṇalas equally weighed define one raupyamāṣaka.

IF transaction weight exceeds one dharna THEN reporting threshold IS triggered for record validation.
IF kṛṣṇalas used in exchange THEN equivalence MUST be verified as two kṛṣṇalas per raupyamāṣaka.
IF deviation detected in weight standard THEN automatic realignment protocol initiates corrective data propagation.
IF party fails to apply correct measure THEN system assigns completion process to restore transactional integrity.
